wikipedia_page.main: Allan Gauden (20 November 1944 – 29 April 2020) was an English professional footballer who played as a midfielder. He played professionally for Sunderland, Darlington, Grimsby Town, Hartlepool United and Gillingham between 1962 and 1976, and in total made 329 appearances in the Football League, scoring 75 goals.

response: * 29 April 2020: Allan Gauden, 75, Sunderland, Darlington, Grimsby Town, Hartlepool United and Gillingham midfielder.
**Allan Gauden, 75, English footballer (Sunderland, Darlington, Grimsby Town, Hartlepool United, Gillingham).
